segments.text: I guess you should know that you need to be hospitalized .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now you can go to the in-patient department to go through the admission procedures .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I'll go right now . By the way , do you think I â€™ ll have to stay in the hospital for long ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's hard to say . It depends on your recovery condition . But you need to stay for at least one day for observation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Doctor . I will go now . Bye-bye .
segments.speaker: S2
